channel.title: Science on Javier Tamayo-Leiva
channel.description: Recent content in Science on Javier Tamayo-Leiva

item.title: Hello Blog!
item.description: Since I realized all the possibilities about coding in R -mostly- but also in other language, I wanted to create a blog to share some of the things I have learned. However, I also like the idea of a blog as a platform to share incoming knowledge as a learning-teaching process.
